snippet: The Washington Republic states that Dr. GARDNER, who arrived here in the pacific, appeared in the Criminal Court, at Washington, on Tuesday, to answer the charge of preferring a fraudulent claim against the United States, before the Commission on ...
lead_paragraph: The Washington Republic states that Dr. GARDNER, who arrived here in the pacific, appeared in the Criminal Court, at Washington, on Tuesday, to answer the charge of preferring a fraudulent claim against the United States, before the Commission on Mexican Claims. Mr. Carlisle, his counsel, addressed the Court,

headline.main: The Alleged Mexican Fraud--Case of Dr. Gardner.

abstract: appears before Crim court at Washington to answer charge of fraud
